display_help: You can manifest a polarized electricity field that hovers above the ground and hurls bolts of electricity at nearby foes. Any enemy that passes near this Sentinel risks serious injury. The Sentinel is not alive and cannot be targeted or attacked by enemies. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Very Long
display_short_help: Summon Sentinel: Ranged, High DMG(Energy), Foe -End
display_target_help: You can manifest a polarized electricity field that hovers above the ground and hurls bolts of electricity at nearby foes. Any enemy that passes near this Sentinel risks serious injury. The Sentinel is not alive and cannot be targeted or attacked by enemies. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Very Long
display_target_short_help: Summon Sentinel: Ranged, High DMG(Energy), Foe -End
